description.zh-cn: 中共元老习仲勋的长女，中共中央总书记习近平的姐姐，企业家。她拥有香港身份证和加拿大永久居留权。
description.en: The eldest daughter of CCP elder Xi Zhongxun and the elder sister of CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping, she is a businesswoman. She holds a Hong Kong identity card and permanent residency in Canada.

description.zh-cn: 湖北人，企业家，齐桥桥的第二任丈夫。
description.en: A native of Hubei, an entrepreneur, and the second husband of Qi Qiaoqiao.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Qi Qiaoqiao.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，曾任国务院副总理和全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: One of the Eight Great Eminent Officials of the CCP, former Vice Premier of the State Council and Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋的第二任妻子。
description.en: The second wife of Xi Zhongxun.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥的弟弟，现任中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: Younger brother of Qi Qiaoqiao, current General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, President of the PRC, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥的妹妹，拥有澳大利亚永久居民身份。
description.en: Younger sister of Qi Qiaoqiao, holds Australian permanent residency.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥的弟弟，曾任国际节能环保协会会长。
description.en: Younger brother of Qi Qiaoqiao, former president of the International Energy Conservation and Environmental Protection Association.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥的同父异母姐姐。
description.en: Half-sister of Qi Qiaoqiao.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥的同父异母姐姐。
description.en: Half-sister of Qi Qiaoqiao.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥的同父异母哥哥。
description.en: Half-brother of Qi Qiaoqiao.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋的前妻。
description.en: Ex-wife of Xi Zhongxun.

description.zh-cn: 齐安安的丈夫。
description.en: Husband of Qi An'an.

description.zh-cn: 习近平的女儿，齐桥桥的侄女。
description.en: Daughter of Xi Jinping and niece of Qi Qiaoqiao.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥的出生地。
description.en: Birthplace of Qi Qiaoqiao.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的一所干部子弟学校，齐桥桥曾在此就读小学。
description.en: A school for children of cadres in Beijing, where Qi Qiaoqiao attended primary school.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥曾在此就读中学。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao attended middle school here.

en: Inner Mongolia Production and Construction Corps

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥青年时期曾在此插队。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao was a sent-down youth here in her youth.

nodes.id: 北京中民信房地产开发有限公司

zh-cn: 北京中民信房地产开发有限公司

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥担任董事长的房地产公司。
description.en: A real estate company where Qi Qiaoqiao serves as the chairman.

nodes.id: 北京秦川大地文化传播有限公司

zh-cn: 北京秦川大地文化传播有限公司

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥担任负责人的文化传播公司。
description.en: A culture communication company where Qi Qiaoqiao is the person in charge.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥担任客座教授的大学。
description.en: A university where Qi Qiaoqiao serves as a visiting professor.

description.zh-cn: 齐安安是该公司的实际拥有者之一。
description.en: Qi An'an is one of the actual owners of this company.

description.zh-cn: 齐安安是该公司的实际拥有者之一。
description.en: Qi An'an is one of the actual owners of this company.

description.zh-cn: 习远平曾担任会长的协会。
description.en: An association where Xi Yuanping once served as president.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥于1949年3月1日出生在延安桥儿沟中央医院。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao was born on March 1, 1949, at Yan'an Central Hospital in Qiao'ergou.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥在北京市八一学校就读小学。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao attended primary school at Beijing Bayi School.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥在河北北京中学（后改名北京市地安门中学）就读中学。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao attended middle school at Hebei Beijing Middle School (later renamed Beijing Di'anmen Middle School).

description.zh-cn: 青年时期，齐桥桥在内蒙古生产建设兵团插队。
description.en: In her youth, Qi Qiaoqiao worked as a sent-down youth in the Inner Mongolia Production and Construction Corps.

relationships.target: 北京中民信房地产开发有限公司

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥担任北京中民信房地产开发有限公司董事长。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao serves as the Chairman of Beijing Zhongminxin Real Estate Development Co., Ltd.

relationships.target: 北京秦川大地文化传播有限公司

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥是北京秦川大地文化传播有限公司的负责人。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao is the person in charge of Beijing Qinchuan Dadi Culture Communication Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥是银川大学的客座教授。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao is a visiting professor at Yinchuan University.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥于1996年与邓家贵结婚，邓家贵是她的第二任丈夫。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao married Deng Jiagui in 1996; he is her second husband.

description.zh-cn: 邓家贵于1990年与齐桥桥相识。
description.en: Deng Jiagui met Qi Qiaoqiao in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 张燕南是齐桥桥的女儿。
description.en: Zhang Yannan is the daughter of Qi Qiaoqiao.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥是习仲勋的女儿。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao is the daughter of Xi Zhongxun.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥是齐心的女儿。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao is the daughter of Qi Xin.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥是习近平的姐姐。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao is the elder sister of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥是齐安安的姐姐。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao is the elder sister of Qi An'an.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥是习远平的姐姐。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao is the elder sister of Xi Yuanping.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥是习和平的同父异母妹妹。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao is the younger half-sister of Xi Heping.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥是习干平的同父异母妹妹。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao is the younger half-sister of Xi Ganping.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥是习正宁的同父异母妹妹。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao is the younger half-sister of Xi Zhengning.

description.zh-cn: 齐心是习仲勋的第二任妻子。
description.en: Qi Xin was the second wife of Xi Zhongxun.

description.zh-cn: 郝明珠是习仲勋的前妻。
description.en: Hao Mingzhu was the ex-wife of Xi Zhongxun.

description.zh-cn: 习和平是郝明珠的女儿。
description.en: Xi Heping is the daughter of Hao Mingzhu.

description.zh-cn: 习干平是郝明珠的女儿。
description.en: Xi Ganping is the daughter of Hao Mingzhu.

description.zh-cn: 习正宁是郝明珠的儿子。
description.en: Xi Zhengning is the son of Hao Mingzhu.

description.zh-cn: 习明泽是习近平的女儿。
description.en: Xi Mingze is the daughter of Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 齐桥桥是习明泽的姑姑。
description.en: Qi Qiaoqiao is the paternal aunt of Xi Mingze.

description.zh-cn: 习仲勋让女儿习桥桥随母姓，改名齐桥桥。
description.en: Xi Zhongxun had his daughter Xi Qiaoqiao take her mother's surname, changing her name to Qi Qiaoqiao.
